      private void shutdownLocalFiles()
      Tell the owner of your local files that you will shutdown. the owner will then remove the file if it hasn't been downloaded, otherwise it will change the download location.
      private void shutdownReplicatedFiles()
      Send the replicated files to the new owner on shutdown. wait until this is done before exiting the process.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Start the shutdown

      • failure

        public void failure()
        Next node fails. notify server and next + previous node of this change. reinitialize own previous and next nodes.

      • controlFiles

        public void controlFiles()

        Send list of files.

      • addOwnerList

        public void addOwnerList(java.lang.String name)

      • removeFile

        public void removeFile(java.lang.String fileName)
        Remove a file of which this node is the owner, both on the ownerlist as on the disk.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the file that has to be removed.

      • createJSONObject

        private java.lang.String createJSONObject(java.lang.String type,
                                          java.lang.Object data)
                                   throws org.json.JSONException
        create a JSON string int the form of { type: "[type]", data: [object] }. this way certain data will be easy to send over any connection to another node.
        Parameters:
        type - A short string representation of what the receiver has to do with the file.
        data - The Object that has to be sent over
        Returns:
        a string representation of all the data that has to be sent.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - Something went wrong while creating the JSON object.

      • initNodes

        private void initNodes()
        Initialize nodes on startup.

      • setPrev

        private void setPrev(int hash)
        Set new previous node.
        Parameters:
        hash - the hash of the new node

      • setNext

        private void setNext(int hash)
        Set new next node.
        Parameters:
        hash - the hash of the new node

      • shutdownReplicatedFiles

        private void shutdownReplicatedFiles()
                              throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Send the replicated files to the new owner on shutdown. wait until this is done before exiting the process.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - there went something wrong in the send file thread. the thread was stopped preemptively.

      • shutdownLocalFiles

        private void shutdownLocalFiles()
        Tell the owner of your local files that you will shutdown. the owner will then remove the file if it hasn't been downloaded, otherwise it will change the download location.

      • sendUDP

        private void sendUDP(java.net.DatagramSocket socket,
                     java.lang.String ip,
                     java.lang.String data)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Send UDP message.
        Parameters:
        socket - the socket over which the file has to be sent
        ip - the ip of the node that needs to be sent to
        data - the data converted to a JSON string that will be sent to the node.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Something went wrong while writing to the UDP socket

      • printNodes

        public void printNodes()
        Print out the current nodes.
